summary: Machine Learning Engineer specialized in AI, NLP, Computer Vision and model deployment. Experienced with building ML pipelines, RAG-style applications, and productionizing ML systems using FastAPI, Docker and modern deep learning frameworks.

experience.summary: Assisted in teaching AI & ML courses, supervised practical labs, and guided students in AI academic projects and research.
Developed face recognition for security applications, implemented real-time object detection using RTSP cameras, and used Django for AI web solutions.
